name: A light green toxin infused leather belt
data: It increases the users dexterity a bit.
It increases the users intelligence a bit.
It increases the users charisma a bit.
It has adequate armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration a tiny bit.
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration noticably.
This item loses its magical powers somewhat slower than average.
It increases the users poison resistance strongly.
The wearer becomes more attuned to the elemental forces.
